reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Aztec for the 4th of July weekend and had a great time. It is close enough to the boardwalk to get to the Wildwood fun but far enough away that it was quiet and peaceful as well. Pool is small, but nicely maintained and breakfast pastries were good treat. Rooms were average NJ Shore motel rooms and parking wasn't a problem.
reviews.title: Recommend!

likes.disliked: — Rooms were average NJ Shore motel rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to the wildwoods to attend "the Burrs atthe beach". this is agathering of grads from West Catholic HS (Phila PA). We picked this motel due to location of friends & family.
reviews.title: A great little motel with very clean & pleasent accomadations.
